body_html: @siddharth-agrawal I had the same impression as @samjabrahams, i.e. that you wanted to add the missing tests. I do prefer that PRs bundle new code (in this case new classes) and associated new tests, so I prefer you add the tests to this PR. Since I've already reviewed most of the code it will not be a a lot of work.

body: @siddharth-agrawal I had the same impression as @samjabrahams, i.e. that you wanted to add the missing tests. I do prefer that PRs bundle new code (in this case new classes) and associated new tests, so I prefer you add the tests to this PR. Since I've already reviewed most of the code it will not be a a lot of work.
